entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 this morning then north 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
